select pi.user_num, pi.product_num, pi.product_title, pi.product_price, ig.image_path, ui.user_name from (
product_info as pi join like_info as li on pi.product_num = li.product_num
join image as ig on pi.product_num = ig.product_num
join user_info as ui on pi.user_num = ui.user_num
where li.user_num = #{user_num})
